about_the_game:
By purchasing this DLC, you will receive the Kawaii Neko Girls 2 soundtrack and your donation will help us improve the quality of the games, implement new ideas and create engaging content for all gamers.
We strive to improve the quality of gameplay and bring new ideas to every game we play.
But without your help, we won't be able to continue this work.
We believe that each of us can contribute to the creation of something bigger than ourselves.
Support us on our creative journey and help us create engaging content that's worth your time.
Your support will allow us to keep doing what we love - making better games for you.
Thank you so much for your support!
